results.name: Array read by antidiagonals with T(n,k) = min(n,k).
comment: Also, "correlation triangle" for the constant sequence 1. - _Paul Barry_, Jan 16 2006

As a triangle, row sums are A002620. T(2n,n)=n+1. Diagonal sums are A001399. Construction: Take antidiagonal triangle of MM^T where M is the sequence array for the constant sequence 1 (lower triangular matrix with all 1's). - _Paul Barry_, Jan 16 2006
As a triangle, count up to ceiling(n/2) and back down again (repeating the central term when n is even).
When the first two instances of each number are removed from the sequence, the original sequence is recovered.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Rows n=1..100 of triangle, flattened
formula: Number triangle T(n, k)=sum{j=0..n, [j<=k][j<=n-k]}. - _Paul Barry_, Jan 16 2006
